shortdesc.ph: Callback when the camera exposure area changes.
Callback when the camera exposure area changes.
Callback when the camera exposure area changes.

p.codeblock: final void Function(int x, int y, int width, int height)? onCameraExposureAreaChanged;
public virtual void OnCameraExposureAreaChanged(int x, int y, int width, int height)

section.p: This callback is triggered when the local user calls the method to change the exposure position.
This callback is triggered when the local user calls to change the exposure position.
section.note: This callback is applicable to Android and iOS only.
This callback is applicable only to Android and iOS.

plentry.pd: The x-coordinate of the changed exposure area.
The y-coordinate of the changed exposure area.
The width of the changed exposure area.
The height of the changed exposure area.
